segments.text: Professor , I will not be here for our next class meeting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I tried to work something out , but I really do have to miss one class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you be able to make up the work you missed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to be doing a lot of extra reading .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Remember that I will only let you miss one class meeting per semester .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you e-mail me this week as a reminder ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Make good use of that day off ; you'll only have one this semester !
segments.speaker: S2
